Description: Rim and body sherd of South Ionian pottery cup with everted rim; interior: reserved line at top of lip, glazed below with added red band lined in white; exterior: lip glazed black with worn red and white bands; handle zone reserved; inscription on exterior.
Type series: Vallet and Villard Ionian cup type A1
Curator's comments: Schlotzhauer identifies the sherd as belonging to his Type 8Bg South Ionian cup with everted rim. Very few Type 8 cups have been identified at Naukratis. These cups are amongst the stylistically oldest South Ionian cups with everted rims at Naukratis.
Bibliographic references: Schlotzhauer 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus Naukratis (p. 49, no. 2)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GE.073) (Phase 3)
